website_summaries.verdict: This coffee maker allows you to set your coffee strength before it grinds and brews on demand.
pros: Gives good flavor by automatically grinding the exact amount of beans you need right before it brews
Top hopper can hold a half-pound of beans
Makes a consistent cup of coffee to your taste
cons: Doesn't keep the coffee as hot after it is brewed as others on the market and does not include a set-able thermometer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coffee maker I could possibly ask for and it's my second one of the same model. I had the first one for many years and loved it. When it came time to buy a new one, I bought the same model. It grinds fresh beans (and can also use ground coffee) and drips the coffee through a gold filter into an attractive container for serving. I can make from 2 to 12 cups of coffee at a time with three different strength settings to choose from. My husband and I generally keep it set on "medium". When our nephew visits, he pushes the button to "strong". The coffee is delicious either way.
customer_reviews.author: PAK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coffee -- for 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker. You can really taste the flavor of the freshly ground (make that instantly) beans. It will spoil you for other coffee makers. I am now on my 3rd Cuisinart Grind and Brew. Why 3? Because this coffeemaker, as fabulous as it is, does not last longer than 3 years - coincidently the same length of time as the warranty. Save your receipt. You will need it. Still, with all that, I still recommend it and will buy another when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: In the Grove

customer_reviews.title: It does the job in a very good way.
customer_reviews.text: I love my coffee as soon as I'm out of bed and this pot does the trick. It lets you set the cup quantity and the strength and of course the time to start and an adjustment for when to shut off. The only draw back is regular cleaning of the grind shute which isn't hard and is caused by the oily Starbucks beans I use. Love it and just ordered my 2nd one after many service years on the original.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stops working quick.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this for the first few months. It was wonderful waking up to fresh ground coffee. Unfortunately the lid mechanism that open the grinder chute started to occasionally not stay open during the grinding leading to only hot water in the carafe. Clean it up and remake and move on... This started happening more and more often. Now it's to the point that it is completely unusable. Would only recommend for rare use cases, not daily use
customer_reviews.author: Austin Madison

customer_reviews.title: The new DGB-700BC does not work as well as the ...
customer_reviews.text: The new DGB-700BC does not work as well as the old version. I had an older model for four years. The new model will not grind the beans without reseting the basket several times.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin D, McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Consistently good taste
customer_reviews.text: Makes brewing coffee easier with the bean hopper that holds 1/2 pound. Coffee taste and strength are consistent when changing amounts that were made. Brewing 2 cups taste as good as brewing 12. Easier to clean that the previous Cuisinart coffeemaker that I had for 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wissinger

customer_reviews.title: Huge Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: This makes great coffee but in my opinion there is one huge flaw. The coffee pot will brew all of the water in the reservoir - even if the cup setting is different. So if you have the cup setting at 4 but the reservoir is full (enough water for 12 cups) it will brew 12 cups. It’s annoying having to put water in every time you use it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hadden

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart Does NOT honor their customer service correspondent statements
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Cuisinart coffee maker with grinder. The first one caught on fire and returned to Bed Bath and Beyond no problem. The second one, this one ordered from Amazon, would not complete the grind cycle. I returned it to Cuisinart in June 2020 and just received my replacement on September 23rd 2020 after making numerous phone calls to Cuisinart and being told it was shipping tomorrow, then out of stock, then a replacement model DGB800 as this one DGB700BC was no longer available. Then on 9/24, 3 months later I received model DGB700 BC which I was told no longer available. Such poor customer service. I will never purchase another Cuisinart product again.
customer_reviews.author: Raralyn

customer_reviews.title: Drink fast your coffee won't stay hot long
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is our second Cuisinart that we've owned . The first one only failed after 8 years. This new one shuts off no matter what the time off is set for( factory defaults to 2 hours) . I've tried reprogramming it several times and it gets done brewing a great cup of coffee and shuts off immediately. I will try to get another because I know they make a great product but I got a lemon
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker. The only negative and it is a minor negative, it is quite loud when the beans are being ground. About 20 seconds. We used a coffee press for years but the acid was bothering me. We then tried several different coffee makers. So glad we found this one. This makes some of the best coffee we’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Grind and Brew DGB700BC is an UPGRADE
customer_reviews.text: This is more expensive than lesser models of course but the features are worth it. Easy to clean and maintain. Simple to use compared to some of the other Grind and Brew machines. Carafe is insulated and stainless steel not glass. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Gandalf

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I purposely waited to write a review on this product after reading problem reviews before purchase. After using for two months (and taking precautions) I can say I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: I'm VERY Satisfied!!! Grind on!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The loud starter click then grind gets me out of bed and coffee is ready when I'm out the shower! I've had it for three months now and I'm thinking it's a great value compared to more pricey models. Takes awhile to figure out nuances, but will not diminish my rating as the nuances are on me... Where to set the grind and how much coffee for perfection..ain't gonna happen!
customer_reviews.author: Peter D. Veronesi

customer_reviews.title: Combination!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice automatic coffee maker. I wish I had purchased one of these before as the self grinding option is awesome and easy to use. No need for a separate grinder as machine does it all.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Windhorst

customer_reviews.title: A real guest pleaser
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of this model I have purchased. Really superior construction, they last for years .
customer_reviews.author: P. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: We really like this grind and brew coffee maker. erfect for our lifestyle and needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Burr Grinder is Great and Overall Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean. Burr Grinder was absolutely worth the intense amazon research and comparing against the newer model. Really happy overall and have used it near daily when home. Learned very quickly that it all comes down to the quality of beans you get. Price is definitely fair in retrospect.
customer_reviews.author: Samir Qurashi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and produces great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this coffee maker for my husband for Christmas. He is really hard to buy for, and I am pleased to say that he absolutely loves this coffee maker! Pros: Easy to use Easy to clean Flavor is amazing Cons: The grinder is loud, but that is to be expected. Overall, very satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: S.Alyse

customer_reviews.title: This is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wont stop smiling about his special surprise gift for Christmas. He loves it and the coffee is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the ...
customer_reviews.text: My 89 year old father bought this. When we received it we set it to brew 2 cups, it brewed 10. after waiting for 1 hour to talk to a tech online, they told us to unplug it for 24 hrs. 24 hrs later, it still did not work. Having to pack it up and take it to the post office was a pain.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY S. KUCHTA

customer_reviews.title: ... second purchase of the grind and brew and we love it. It's nice to get up to a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of the grind and brew and we love it. It's nice to get up to a great cup of coffee in the morning...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: I like the compactness of the machine. I had a cuisinart coffee maker several years ago and it worked very very well for quite a few years. This is why I chose to buy a new Cuisinart. However, I don’t like that the coffee carafe is glass because it can break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Montalvan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. Works great and I love that using whole beans takes the same amount prep time in the morning as pre-ground. And now I don't have coffee grounds all over my counter from my burr grinder!
customer_reviews.author: Dad Q

customer_reviews.title: Much improved model.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps coffee hot. Insulated Carafe model was useless. Improved model makes great coffee.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee grinder and maker
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker work well and grinds and makes excellent fresh coffe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep clean for excellence
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coffee maker BUT you must be willing to clean it thoroughly at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Great for real coffee lovers.
customer_reviews.text: This item is awesome. I gave one to my coffee loving daughter that just had a baby and she told me this machine was a real game changer. It is very cool to set it up the night before and have fresh brewed coffee when you wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: A good value so far
customer_reviews.text: A bit over one month and it is working well. The fresh ground beans make good coffee. The undersized basket is a negative element, but only when making a full pot. Cleaned is a bit more work than a typical machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Scott

customer_reviews.title: Manuals missing
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with no documentation, instruction manual, warranty or registration cards. Suspect item was previously opened. Package damaged, but no apparent damage to unit. Won't rate till I obtain a manual.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Sweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This One!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker seemed to work moderately well for a short time and within a month quite grinding the beans. It now appears that I can no longer return it. Do not buy this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Tough to clean basket cover especially after using grinding feature.
customer_reviews.author: DonJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far great coffee maker. we have had it for a couple weeks and love it.
customer_reviews.author: colleen mccoole

customer_reviews.title: If you want a great cup of coffee, this is the machine for you!
customer_reviews.text: Made amazing coffee! The down side is the grind cycle is so loud, you can use it as an alarm clock!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh brewed coffee beans and delicious cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Love my cuisinart, this is my third one and none have broken so far.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: We had to toss our old one that lasted nearly 10 years and replaced it with the identical coffee maker. Makes great coffee. Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: James McRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clog
customer_reviews.text: Great machine , my old kenmore would always clog , not this bad boy !
customer_reviews.author: STEPHAN NOROSKI

customer_reviews.title: Makes good coffee. Has a glass carafe with a four ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes good coffee. Has a glass carafe with a four hour timer to keep the coffee warm.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the big reservoir for beans and the taste of fresh ground coffee without having to take the extra step of grinding it myself!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to program and the coffee turns out amazing
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Fresh coffee
customer_reviews.text: Grinding fresh beans and making coffee. The dials and print could be larger and clearer to read
customer_reviews.author: michael brezinski

customer_reviews.title: Would not really recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: It was an open and used item! The cup brewing setting does not work. You can set it to brew a two cup and it will brew the entire pot!
customer_reviews.author: Imelda Espejel

customer_reviews.title: Good fresh brewed coffee
customer_reviews.text: Fresh ground coffee in the AM is wonderful and this is a well made grinder and brewer
customer_reviews.author: Edward Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: This makes fresh ground coffee every time. Best coffee maker I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: The heating plate keeps the coffee hot, hours after it's finished brewing .
customer_reviews.text: I Love it, it brews both beans and ground with full flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Carlene

customer_reviews.title: love using whole bean and this is extremely solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement unit, love using whole bean and this is extremely solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used Item with water in it...
customer_reviews.text: Bought new but received an used item. There were water in the reservoir.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the glass pot over the carafe it stay hotter longer!
customer_reviews.author: Nita Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This best coffee maker ever! Love fresh coffee in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Coffee is good, not great
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, Coffee is good, not great. Machine however is really got some flaws, to many parts to clean before each brew and the coffee pot itself has a lid that has to be pried up, kind of a silly. Lastly the water reservoir is so small I spill water all over my counter every morning. I should have re-purchased the Cappresso machine I had in the past. :( Live and learn
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding buying experience.
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade to one stop coffee brewing. Consistently good pots of coffee brewed to our taste from freshly ground beans. Perfect incentive for getting out of bed in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality control?
customer_reviews.text: Problems with the auto-off programming - called customer service and they said it will need to be returned. This is my second Cuisinart grind and brew. The first lasted about a year (two pots per day avg)
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: brews a great cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: brews a great cup of coffee, but you have to be diligent in cleaning out the shoots weekly otherwise it gets clogged. Also be diligent about aligning the top of the filter basket properly otherwise the grounds won't get into the basket. I used a metalic marker to mark the line up icons since they are hard to see (black on black).
customer_reviews.author: Norene Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Makes the best cup of coffee we have had from an automatic brewer. This is our second purchase of this machine. The first lasted 10 years. If you like strong coffee I recommend setting the number of cups two higher than the water being used and set it for the strongest grind level.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Delish
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker makes delicious coffee. I make six cups each morning and from grind to ready to pour takes about seven minutes. You have to be willing to clear the chute where some ground coffee can collect every week or so depending on how much coffee you make. It's not difficult and takes maybe five minutes. No big deal. It's worth it for a cup of coffee from fresh ground beans.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: We’re really enjoying this coffee maker. After about a months worth of use, there have been no issues. It grinds well, allows a wide range of cup selections and choice of strength. There’s a little extra clean up as the ground beans are dumped into the filter through a lid covering the filter, but removal and a quick rinse is easy. I haven’t yet needed to clean the grinder so I don’t know if that will be a pain but I don’t imagine having to do it once a month will be too big a burden. Overall very good coffee maker that grinds and brews all in one. Great idea.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite parts of the morning is waking up and smelling ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite parts of the morning is waking up and smelling the fresh ground and brewed coffee. This glass carafe serves a HOT cup of coffee unlike the stainless that starts to cool the coffee immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, Excellent flavor, Easy to set up and operate
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee pot. Easy to set up, simple to set the time and the delay brew time. I love it that I can fill it with the beans and not have to add beans every time I make coffee. This is my first grind and brew coffee pot and it was a great choice. The coffee brews amazingly fast and it tastes sooo much better than the pre ground coffee. I had no idea how much difference it would make. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee Maker I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this upon the recommendation of a friend. I absolutely love this coffee pot. It is so easy to use, makes an excellent cup of coffee and is super easy to clean. Definitely would buy again and will absolutely buy as gifts,
customer_reviews.author: Puzzle Lover

customer_reviews.title: Makes good coffee, but unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The grinder has stopped working after less than six months. When it works, it makes great coffee. It's easy to clean too. I just wish it worked. I will update this after I hear back from Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ware

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee machine. This is the second one I have owned in 7 years. Last one had malfunction in the electronics circuit.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pachter

customer_reviews.title: requires lots of work but makes GREAT COFFEE
customer_reviews.text: you need to clean the chutes often or they get blocked. Not easy to keep it running smooth but it does make GREAT COFFEE
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, easy to use grind and brew coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: Great way access fresh ground coffee in a convenient, simple process. This is the third one of these we have owned. Heating element gives out after about 4 years of constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Um, good coffee
customer_reviews.text: Added this one to our motorhome. Have one in the house too. GREAT coffee maker, love the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Feller

customer_reviews.title: Coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd grind and brew. I like the fresh coffee. I buy coffee beans from a local roaster. Much cheaper and faster than going through the kiosk line.
customer_reviews.author: sc

customer_reviews.title: Better than Kuerigs or Starbucks!
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and clean. Makes the beat cup of coffee. You can brew as little or as much as you want and control the strength too.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Grind fresh beans  - all the difference!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new coffee maker! Great coffee so far. Easy to use. Pretty easy to clean too. Quick coffee making.
customer_reviews.author: cbcolin

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Bummer. We just got this and it leaked all over the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel D

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Love the coffee maker but it took weeks to get from this selker
customer_reviews.author: K. Grippa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with excellent results!
customer_reviews.text: The burr grinder on this unit is excellent and you are able to tailor your coffee to exactly the way you like it and the amount you need.
customer_reviews.author: darrellr

customer_reviews.title: This one does NOT sound like a airplane getting ready for take of
customer_reviews.text: Tried other grind and brew coffee makers. From one sounding like a small plane taking off to another needing complicated cleaning before the next use, this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: sabine durden

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's fabulous! Very quiet when grinding, brews fast and the coffee is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Starts beeping when you want to turn it back on to keep your coffee warm.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Starts beeping when you want to turn it back on to keep your coffee warm. Maddening. The amount of beans it grinds for "strong" coffee is not enough-- way too weak for me, and there was no way around it. Had to stick to already ground beans and bypass grinding. I've only had this a few weeks, I am nervous for it to react as others have said (overboiling plate on the bottom, starts smoking.) This does not surprise me, because the rest of it is so terrible. Totally dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Valley High

product_meta.title: Cuisinart DGB-700BC Grind and Brew 12 Cup Coffee Maker (Updated Version)
product_meta.description: 24-hour fully programmable coffeemaker with 12-cup capacity. Built-in burr grinder automatically grinds beans before brewing. Strength selector and grind control fine-tune intensity and volume. 8-ounce bean hopper; auto shutoff; water filter; brew-pause function. Measures 10-2/3 by 8-4/9 by 16-1/4 inches.
feature_bullets: Cuisinart Grind & BrewTM 12-Cup Automatic Coffee Maker delivers convenient bean-to-cup brewing functionality so that you can enjoy the true flavor of your favorite coffee
Strength selector allows you to choose coffee strength: strong, medium or mild
Sealable, 8 oz. capacity bean hopper holds up to a half-pound of coffee beans
Brew PauseTM lets you enjoy a cup before brewing is finished
Integrated burr grinder automatically grinds coffee beans before brewing for maximum freshness, flavor and aroma

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars195 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
